<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get inventory items by IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/items/ids"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves multiple inventory catalog items by their unique identifiers.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0). Use this when you have a list of known item IDs and want to fetch their details in a single request.

**Prerequisites**:
- **InventoryItemIds**: Obtain IDs from [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/items/query](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventory-items) or from inventory stock records.

**Workflow**:
1. Query the catalog or stock records to collect `InventoryItemId` values
2. Submit an array of IDs to retrieve full item details
3. Use for bulk display or export operations

**Response**: Full item details including category, stock summary, and custom fields.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Array of inventory item IDs to retrieve.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"example":["2b0e2cb0-4cb5-4b0f-9a7d-2c9f2ac830d2","3c1f3dc1-5dc6-5c10-0b8e-3d003bd941e3"]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
